Class: HTML_Node

Source Location: /gan_node_html.php

Class Overview




Holds (x)html/xml tag information like tag name, attributes,  parent, children, self close, etc.

Node subclass for text

Node subclass for comments

Node subclass for CDATA tags

Node subclass for doctype tags






HTML_NODE_EMBEDDED

	
Node subclass for embedded tags like xml, php and asp

$attribute_shorttag =  true

	
[line 197]

  Use shorttags for attributes? If true, then attributes  with values equal to the attribute name will not output  the value, e.g. selected="selected" will be selected.


  

	

  

    

      Type:  
      bool

$filter_map = array(


      'root' => 'filter_root',


      'nth-child' => 'filter_nchild',


      'eq' => 'filter_nchild', //jquery (naming) compatibility


      'gt' => 'filter_gt',


      'lt' => 'filter_lt',


      'nth-last-child' => 'filter_nlastchild',


      'nth-of-type' => 'filter_ntype',


      'nth-last-of-type' => 'filter_nlastype',


      'odd' => 'filter_odd',


      'even' => 'filter_even',


      'every' => 'filter_every',


      'first-child' => 'filter_first',


      'last-child' => 'filter_last',


      'first-of-type' => 'filter_firsttype',


      'last-of-type' => 'filter_lasttype',


      'only-child' => 'filter_onlychild',


      'only-of-type' => 'filter_onlytype',


      'empty' => 'filter_empty',


      'not-empty' => 'filter_notempty',


      'has-text' => 'filter_hastext',


      'no-text' => 'filter_notext',


      'lang' => 'filter_lang',


      'contains' => 'filter_contains',


      'has' => 'filter_has',


      'not' => 'filter_not',


      'element' => 'filter_element',


      'text' => 'filter_text',


      'comment' => 'filter_comment'


   )

	
[line 206]

  Function map used for the selector filter





Tags:





  

    internal:  array('root' => 'filter_root') will cause the  selector to call $this->filter_root at :root
  

  

    access:  private
  






  

	

  

    

      Type:  
      array

		bool match(

$conditions, [array
$match = true], [array
$custom_filters = array()], array
$tags)
    

    


	
		Checks if node matches certain conditions





Tags:





  

    see:  match_filters();

    see:  match_tags();
  

  

    internal:  Used by selector class
  

  

    access:  private

        array  
        $tags  
        array('tags' => array(tag_conditions), 'attributes' => array(attr_conditions), 'filters' => array(filter_conditions))
      

          

        array  
        $match  
        Should conditions evaluate to true?
      

          

        array  
        $custom_filters  
        Custom map next to $filter_map
      

          

          
        $conditions
